aboutpara: Muhammad Kabir has earned numerous titles through his work in transforming businesses across Africa and the world. Aside from being a  Venture capitalist, elite coach and mentor, Muhammad is a General Partner of TDA Couture, a leader in men's fashion combining his business acumen with a passion for style. Recognized for his innovation and leadership, Muhammad mentors aspiring entrepreneurs and shares insights on business strategy. Discover the impact and vision of Muhammad Kabir as he continues to shape the future of business.
